p.s: Package to access and query, and build CDDB audio-CD servers
p.d: The Net_CDDB_Client class is used to access CDDB audio-CD servers via different protocols. The class can get detailed audio-CD data (track names, artist names, album name, etc.) from the CDDB server for a given audio CD. The Net_CDDB_Server class is beta-quality CDDB audio server which speaks the CDDB protocol (currently only over HTTP).
